name: Anthill Death
description:
** 21/04/2020 h10.56 - Little Bugfix Update -> UI and AI fixes

Challenge your friends and family to those who manage to get the beloved ants to survive as much as possible,
against the craziest obstacles you can meet

HOW TO PLAY

Your ant colony is under attack!!!
Keep 'em safe from the dangers that will threat your beloved ants, and save the most you can. Don't drop below the alive ants threshold to win the game.

There are three enemies to face:

Cactus
Keep the displayed keyboard letter pushed until it fades. Be aware, it can propose more than one!

Dungbug
Click on it for the number of times displayed.

Bee
Press the displayed keyboard letter, again it can ask for more key!

Note to players: Thanks for playing our game, we really appreciate it! If you find any bugs, let us know in the comments or directly on our 

Github issue tracker. Don’t forget to give us your feedback!

JOIN OUR #BEATME CHALLENGE!
THE DUNGBUG MUST FALL!
